content.description: The Environmental Protection Agency (<math alttext="E P A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>EPA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>) of the United States recommends taking corrective measures to reduce exposure to radon gas. The <math alttext="E P A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>EPA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has set an action level of <math alttext="4 picocuries per liter" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>pCi</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>L</mtext></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> for radon gas. The graph below shows radon samples taken from seventeen buildings in California. The radon samples were taken from the air inside the buildings, and the uranium concentrations were sampled from the soil under the buildings. Data points from four of the seventeen building locations are labeled A-D.
content.question: Which of the following conclusions can best be drawn from the data in the graph?

choices.label: Location <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has the greatest need for remediation because the radon levels in the building are the highest and exceed the <math alttext="E P A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>EPA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> action level.

Location <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>B</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has the lowest need for remediation because the radon levels in the building are below the suggested action level.
Location <math alttext="C" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has the greatest need for remediation because the radon levels in the soil are the highest.

Location <math alttext="D" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>D</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has the lowest need for remediation because there is no measurable radon in the air or the soil samples.

content.answer: Location <math alttext="A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>A</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> has the greatest need for remediation because the radon levels in the building are the highest and exceed the <math alttext="E P A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>EPA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> action level.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
